test_description: This test is intended for accessibility experts who would like to use external assessment tooling and import their finding into a11yBuddy

steps.name: Screen reader accessibility
steps.desription: Is this step accessible to blind users using a screen reader?

steps.name: Low vision accessibility
steps.desription: Is this step accessible to users with low vision?

steps.name: Deaf and hard of hearing accessibility
steps.desription: Is this step accessible to deaf and hard of hearing users?

steps.name: Motorical disabilities accessibility
steps.desription: Is this step accessible to users with motorical disabilities?

steps.name: Learning disabilities accessibility
steps.desription: Is this step accessible to users with learning disabilities?

steps.name: Neurological disabilities accessibility
steps.desription: Is this step accessible to users with neurological disabilities?

steps.name: Neurodiversity accessibility
steps.desription: Is this step accessible to users with neurodiversity?
